title: Richard Dawkins’ prophetic vision of ‘new colour’ | Richard Dawkins | The Guardian
snippet: The scientist reflects on a speculative idea about human perception in a 2004 book he co-wrote and, two decades on, an experiment that has produced a colour no one has seen before · Sun 20 Apr 2025 ...

title: News | Richard Dawkins Foundation for Reason and Science
snippet: From the Richard Dawkins Foundation Newsletter. Subscribe here. Hello! As you know, 2025 marks the 100th anniversary of the Scopes Monkey Trial. It’s also the twenty-year anniversary of the landmark Kitzmiller v. Dover trial.

title: Richard Dawkins quits atheist group amid transgender debate | Fox News
snippet: Published January 3, 2025 1:58pm ... Richard Dawkins stated that people can only be either male or female while discussing gender ideology on his podcast "The Poetry of Reality."...
